posts.content:
Trying to raise funds to finish another project, so putting my CE Air suspension weed-eater beam up for sale.
Purpose built, narrowed beam with inboard air bag mounts.

It's only been fitted to roll the bus around my workshop, has a couple of chips in the powder coat from a careless courier but they would touch in with a bit of black paint easily (just being honest).

It can come as a bare beam, or with the trailing/swing arms (stripped to bare metal then painted black to match the beam).
I might even be persuaded to part with my dropped spindles if you're interested in buying the full set up (and going very low).
It doesn't have any airbags fitted - I just sat 2 blocks of wood in there for rolling round my workshop as the floor is very flat and the bus is stripped to a shell.

Will put up some pics after the weekend when it's not snowing and I can be arsed to go to my workshop!

Price is £650 for just the beam, £750 with the trailing arms, and £1100 with the trailing arms and dropped spindles. Will not sell the dropped spindles separately - sorry.

Also selling my air management kit in a separate thread - link to follow.

Thanks
Mack
What generation CE airbeam. MK 1 or 2?
